The interview between Bill O: Reilly and President Barack Obama before the Super Bowl on Feb. 2, 2014, where O'Reilly grilled the president about various topics including the Benghazi attack.
The claim made by O: Reilly that he did not peddle a narrative that Obama withheld information about the Benghazi attacks in order to advance his presidential campaign.
The statement made by U: S. Ambassador to the United Nations Susan Rice on national television on Sept. 16, 2012, where she said the attack on the compound began spontaneously and was not pre-planned.
The statements made by White House spoke: 20, 2012, acknowledging that the attack in Benghazi was a terrorist attack and resulted in the deaths of American officials.
